details.name: Developer-friendly hotel
details.description: Built in a 16th Century Portuguese Fort, the five-star Taj Fort Aguada Resort & Spa, Goa is rich in history and culture. Overlooking the Arabian Sea and set across a 73-acre land, guests will experience maximum relaxation.Taj Fort Aguada Resort & Spa, Goa is 100 metres away from Fort Aguada and 45 kilometres away from Dabolim Airport.
